content.title: Running Analytics
content.subtitle: Use the Analytics Tool to run AI models and specialized analyses on datasets.
description: The Analytics Tool is a panel that enables you to apply AI models or other analytical workflows on your datasets for predictive and spatial insights.
The Analytics Tool allows you to run AI models and analyses on selected datasets.

content.title: Visualizing Results
content.subtitle: Explore model outputs and analysis results through the Layer View.
description: Visualization tools in SEAk let you interactively explore AI model outputs, cost analyses, and grid-based assessments.
A Layer is a visual representation of data (e.g., AI model output, cost analysis, or grid-based analysis).
To view results, go to the Layer View under Models.
Click on the model name, and the results will appear on the map.
Zoom In/Out – Use the mouse wheel to zoom smoothly on the map.
Box Zoom – Hold the Shift key and drag to draw a box over the area you want to inspect.
